name: Don't finish the game !
description:
Don't finish the Game

You participate to the UPsiJam, unfortunately for you, the mean staff plans to wreck all the games of the event. And he decided to begin with yours ! You now are the only one who can stop him. Use traps to defeat him and save the day !

Controls

The AI plays the game. Use the traps accessible via the UI to stop him.

  1. Select the traps you want to use with its button
  2. click on the screen where you want to put it
    1. You can't set a trap to close to the player !

Weapons

  • Anvil : Fall from the sky
  • Spikes: Is placed onto the ground
  • Ennemies: Drop it and let it work !

Credits

Background music:  Arcade Kid - By David Renda
